CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On the basis of the above consideration , herein , we designed and synthesized two new D-A copolymers PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO ( Scheme 1 ) based on zNDT flanked with two thiophene units as donor unit and BT or BO as acceptor unit.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| zNDT |
| thiophene units |
| BT |
| BO |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| zNDT |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names: "PzNDTDTBT", "PzNDTDTBO", and "zNDT". The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "thiophene units", "BT", and "BO", do not refer to specific materials and are not material names.
